review: So far I have zero complaints with the Chromecast.  I love being able to control it from my computer, phone or iPad.  I also like that it doesn't have it's own interface and menus I have to fight through (i.e. Roku).  I have a much easier time finding what I want to watch on my phone and then "casting" it to the TV.
